entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
